ygData.subject: Re: Red sash quest questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: GMs will NOT give you ANY advice with quests, other than to say put each item in a separate slot .  That is my experience when I could not get the yellow
ygData.messageBody:
GMs will NOT give you ANY advice with quests, other than to say "put each
item in a separate slot". That is my experience when I could not get the
yellow sash. Chette helped (?) me and that's the party line I got. She
couldn't say anything else and I was really upset. It turns out I was not
giving my white sash, which another monk finally told me I had to do. I
got the quest BEFORE a patch that made giving the white sash mandatory, and
missed it when I re-read the quest text. My friend had already performed
the quest and didn't have to give his sash so that made me not even think
about it...

Jason

-----Original Message-----
From: shadow@... [SMTP:shadow@...]
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 2:40 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Red sash quest questions...

From: shadow@...

From everything I've read, all you need is the blackened wand and the
blackened sapphire, and the orange sash. I too am waiting on the sapphire.
My advice is petition a GM BEFORE you try it, show the items to the GM,
then turn them in.
--
